aws_spot_fleet_request.description: Provides a Spot Fleet Request resource.

iam_fleet_role.description: Grants the Spot fleet permission to terminate

replace_unhealthy_instances.description: Indicates whether Spot fleet should replace unhealthy instances. Default `false`.

launch_specification.description: Used to define the launch configuration of the

launch_template_config.description: Launch template configuration block. See [Launch Template Configs](#launch-template-configs

spot_price.description: The maximum bid price per unit hour.

fleet_type.description: The type of fleet request. Indicates whether the Spot Fleet only requests the target

valid_until.description: The end date and time of the request, in UTC [RFC3339](https://tools.ietf.org/html/rfc3339#section-5.8

valid_from.description: The start date and time of the request, in UTC [RFC3339](https://tools.ietf.org/html/rfc3339#section-5.8

load_balancers.description: A list of elastic load balancer names to add to the Spot fleet.

target_group_arns.description: A list of `aws_alb_target_group` ARNs, for use with Application Load Balancing.

tags.description: A map of tags to assign to the resource.

spot_request_state.description: The state of the Spot fleet request.

create.description: Used when requesting the spot instance (only valid if `wait_for_fulfillment = true`)

delete.description: Used when destroying the spot instance
